name: Vocabulary Tester
tagline: A program to practice for classtests
body:
### What is my Vocabulary Tester?
In general, my Vocabulary Tester is a pretty simple program to practice for classtests.
But can test not only vocabulary: You can use my program to test anything what you want, for Example
* Captial cities (Geography)
* Year dates (History)
and unlimited more

### Techical information
This application is programmed in Delphi Language which is almost similar to Pascal.
It definitely works on Windows 7 but I didn't tried it on other Windows yet.
The '.vok'-Files are lists with the questions in the first half and the appropriate answers are in the second half.


### Authors
This application is developed by @moritz157 in 2015 and will still get updates.

### Support or Contact
If you have any problems or bugs you can contact me on 
* GitHub: moritz157
* Twitter: moritz157
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
